mapper.select: select ac_id, Outlets_Id, ac_balance, ac_alert_balance, ac_close_balance, ac_state, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.fi_advanc_charge where ac_id = #{acId}

select ac_id, Outlets_Id, ac_balance, ac_alert_balance, ac_close_balance, ac_state, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.fi_advanc_charge limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.fi_advanc_charge(Outlets_Id, ac_balance, ac_alert_balance, ac_close_balance, ac_state, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values (#{outletsId}, #{acBalance}, #{acAlertBalance}, #{acCloseBalance}, #{acState}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness})

insert into lms.fi_advanc_charge(Outlets_Id, ac_balance, ac_alert_balance, ac_close_balance, ac_state, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.acBalance}, #{entity.acAlertBalance}, #{entity.acCloseBalance}, #{entity.acState}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})

insert into lms.fi_advanc_charge(Outlets_Id, ac_balance, ac_alert_balance, ac_close_balance, ac_state, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.acBalance}, #{entity.acAlertBalance}, #{entity.acCloseBalance}, #{entity.acState}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})
on duplicate key update Outlets_Id = values(Outlets_Id) , ac_balance = values(ac_balance) , ac_alert_balance = values(ac_alert_balance) , ac_close_balance = values(ac_close_balance) , ac_state = values(ac_state) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness)
mapper.update:
update lms.fi_advanc_charge
Outlets_Id = #{outletsId},
ac_balance = #{acBalance},
ac_alert_balance = #{acAlertBalance},
ac_close_balance = #{acCloseBalance},
ac_state = #{acState},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
where ac_id = #{acId}
